sentence.Network_en: A fellow doesn't last long on what he has done. He's got to keep on delivering as he goes along.--Carl Hubbell, Baseball Player
sentence.Network_cn: 靠过去完成的无法让人保有成功，必须在路上持续交出成绩。

sentence.Network_en: I feel it's done me good to get it off my chest.
sentence.Network_cn: 我感觉吐吐苦水对我有好处。

sentence.Network_en: This can be done if you proceed as follows.
sentence.Network_cn: 按照如下操作即可完成。

jx.jx_en_mean: (US)a plan or project that has been finalized
jx.jx_cn_mean: (美)一个完成了的计划（或项目）

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)in a situation so bad that it is impossible to get out

lj.lj_ly: if the guard sees us, we're done for.
lj.lj_ls: 如果警卫看到我们，就完了。

jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)累极了的；筋疲力尽的

lj.lj_ls: 你看起来已经筋疲力尽了。
你看起来已经筋疲力尽了。

entry.def: Done is the past participle of do .
A task or activity that is done has been completed successfully.

example.ex: When her deal is done, the client emerges with her purchase.
example.tran: 交易完成后，委托人会出现并将她购买的东西交给她。

entry.def: When something that you are cooking is done, it has been cooked long enough and is ready.

example.ex: As soon as the cake is done, remove it from the oven.
example.tran: 蛋糕一烤好就从炉子里取出来。

entry.def: You say 'Done' when you are accepting a deal, arrangement, or bet that someone has offered to make with you.

example.ex: 'You lead and we'll look for it.' — 'Done.'

entry.tran: 完全了结的;彻底完成的
entry.def: If you say that something is over and done with, you mean that it is completely finished and you do not have to think about it any more.

example.ex: Once this is all over and done with you can have a rest.
example.tran: 大功告成后你就可以休息了。

means.word_mean: 1. having finished or arrived at completion;

sentences.sentence: "certain to make history before he's done"
"after the treatment, the patient is through except for follow-up"

list.explanation: 不中用的，完蛋的，没有希望的

example.en: I knew I was done for.
example.zh: 我早就知道我没希望了。

auth_sentence.content: I'd always done a lot of stills photography.
auth_sentence.res_content: I'd always done a lot of stills photography.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I'd always done a lot of stills photography.

auth_sentence.content: Well done to the government for making the decision.
auth_sentence.res_content: Well done to the government for making the decision.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Well done to the government for making the decision.

auth_sentence.content: We simply couldn't have done it without you!
auth_sentence.res_content: We simply couldn't have done it without you!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We simply couldn't have done it without you!

Sentence.sentence: Things have done a complete about-face since then.
Online sharing will change the way business is done in transportation, travel, rentals, etc.
Because that's the way it's done.
Sweden has done more than other nations to close the gender gap.
The best study was done at Bell Labs in New Jersey, a very high IQ place.
Harm to singers done by smoky atmospheres

sentences.en: I have got to go out as soon as this job is done.
sentences.cn: 完成这项工作后我马上就要出去。

sentences.en: The meat’s ready but the vegetables still are not done.
sentences.cn: 肉食已经好了, 蔬菜还未做好。

sentences.en: “I’ll give you twenty pounds for it.”“Done!”

means.word_mean: 处境艰难；注定完蛋；肯定不行

sentences.en: The supplies are so low that we will be done for in a few days if help doesn’t come soon.
sentences.cn: 补给太少了，如果得不到救援的话，我们几天之内就会完蛋。

sentences.en: I think the project is done for—the money’s almost gone and we’ve got no results after three years’ hard work.
sentences.cn: 我认为这个项目肯定不行，钱几乎花光了，苦干了三年仍毫无结果。

sentences.en: I got done for speeding on my way back home.
sentences.cn: 我在回家的路上因超速行驶而受罚。

means.word_mean: 与( 某人) 断绝关系；做完，了结(尤指令人不快的事情)

sentences.en: I’m fed up with you lot! I’m done with you for ever!
sentences.cn: 我受够了你们这些人！我再也不想跟你们有任何关系！

sentences.en: Let’s have done with this silly argument.
sentences.cn: 我们停止这种愚蠢的争吵吧。

sentences.en: Well I’m glad that’s over and done with. I was so nervous.
sentences.cn: 我很高兴终于结束了，我刚才很紧张。

means.word_mean: (计划或活动等)已经完全结束(或准备好了)

sentences.en: Everybody else seems to think the deal will be done and dusted by lunchtime, but I’m not so sure.
sentences.cn: 似乎大家都觉得这笔交易在午饭前就能完成，可是我卻不那么肯定。

means.word_mean: 木已成舟的事情；无法改变的决定(或安排等)

sentences.en: The managing director denied that the merger was a done deal, and said they were still in negotiations.
sentences.cn: 总经理否认合并已经敲定， 声称此事仍在商讨中。

means.word_mean: 合乎礼仪的行为； 得体的举止

sentences.en: Smoking while somebody else is eating is not the done thing.
sentences.cn: 在其他人吃饭的时候吸烟是不得体的行为。

sentences.en: It’s the done thing to dress for dinner in this hotel.
sentences.cn: 在这家宾馆用餐着正装才是合乎礼仪的。

sentences.en: We had a wonderful dinner, with chicken done to a turn and home-grown vegetables.
sentences.cn: 我们吃了顿丰美的晚餐，鸡肉做得恰到火候，还有自家种的蔬菜。

means.word_mean: (表示惊奇、烦恼等) 怎么搞的

sentences.en: Someone’s gone and locked the door and I haven’t got a key!
sentences.cn: 谁那么讨厌把门锁上走了，我没有带钥匙！

sentences.en: What’s he been and done now?
